Package com.atakmap.android.http.rest

Class DownloadProgressTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.http.rest.DownloadProgressTracker
  • public class DownloadProgressTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Track ongoing download progress including percentage, smoothed average throughput, and estimated time remaining Assume that invokers periodically notify the user somehow, which starts a new "block" for tracking purposes

        public boolean contentReceived​(int len,
                               long currentTime)
        Update internal state for amount of data received If conditions are met for starting a new block, then additional internal state is updated
        Parameters:
        len - the length of the content received
        currentTime - the current time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if we should update/notify user

      • notified

        public void notified​(long currentTime)
        User has been notified, finish updating internal state to start new block
        Parameters:
        currentTime - the current time for the notification in millis since epoch
